title: Suits by individuals; jurisdiction; venue
context: [ยง347-13.5] Suits by individuals; jurisdiction; venue. Any person injured by a violation of section 347-13 may bring a civil action to recover three times the person&rsquo;s actual damages or $1,000, whichever sum is greater, for each violation. Any person bringing such an action shall also be entitled to recover the person&rsquo;s costs together with reasonable attorneys&rsquo; fees. An action under this section shall be brought in the circuit court of the district in which the violation is alleged to have occurred. [L 1988, c 206, ยง1]
